name: Double Apocalypse
description: Doom guy gets thirsty and so he ventures southeast to get that precious commodity that we too often take for granted. Not only does he get what he wants, he also satisfies his thirst for demon blood as he finds out that hell spawn is once again contaminating earthly soil. His mission over, he returns home only to find ... Anyway, these are 7 new levels for Doom 2 with a surprise.
